enb_long_title: Eighth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
section_title: SUBSIDIARY BODY FOR SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNOLOGICAL ADVICE
sentences: SBSTA Chair Halldór Thorgeirsson (Iceland) opened the seventeenth session on Wednesday afternoon, 23 October.
Noting that the SBSTA Vice-Chair had resigned, he said a replacement nomination was expected from GRULAC.
He also said Tatyana Osokova (Uzbekistan) would serve as Rapporteur.
The SBSTA adopted the provisional agenda (FCCC/SBSTA/2002/7).
The SBSTA met for four days, established numerous contact groups and adopted its conclusions and draft decisions on Tuesday, 29 October.
All conclusions and draft decisions were forwarded to the COP for adoption on Friday, 1 November.
